description:
Welcome to the world of late-night races and endless opportunities! With the Midnight Drifter - DLC Pack, your races will become not only more adrenaline-pumping but also more profitable. Discover what true wealth on the roads means, beyond just speed.
   You'll be able to upgrade your drifting skills and earn substantial amounts of money to become a leader in the Midnight Drifter world. Don't miss this opportunity and embark on an exciting journey towards wealth!
name: Midnight Drifter - DLC Pack
